biotools.summary: Apscale is a metabarcoding pipeline that handles the most common tasks in metabarcoding pipelines like paired-end merging, primer trimming, quality filtering, otu clustering and denoising as well as an otu filtering step.

bioschemas.name: APSCALE
bioschemas.summary: Apscale is a metabarcoding pipeline that handles the most common tasks in metabarcoding pipelines like paired-end merging, primer trimming, quality filtering, otu clustering and denoising as well as an otu filtering step.
